description: doc: update install docs for Windows and Go 1, add golang-announce to /project

messages.text:
*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=d21163008913 ***

doc: update install docs for Windows and Go 1, add golang-announce to /project

R=golang-dev, bradfitz, r, rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5758044

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg

On 6 March 2012 14:55,  <r@golang.org> wrote:
> LGTM
>
>
> http://codereview.appspot.com/5758044/diff/6/doc/install.html
> File doc/install.html (right):
>
> http://codereview.appspot.com/5758044/diff/6/doc/install.html#newcode124
> doc/install.html:124: command prompts for the change to take effect.
> is that the right phrase, open command prompts?
>
> "Windows is shutting down. Please close all prompts."

AFAIK yes.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5758044/diff/1/doc/install-source.html File doc/install-source.html (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/5758044/diff/1/doc/install-source.html#newcode263 doc/install-source.html:263: The release tag refers to the current stable release of Go 1. s/ 1// ? Otherwise this statement won't be accurate for a bit. http://codereview.appspot.com/5758044/diff/1/doc/install-source.html#newcode324 doc/install-source.html:324: darwin (Mac OS X 10.5 and above), freebsd, oh, 10.5? I thought we'd slipped into 10.6+ at some point, but I can't remember for sure. we certainly don't have a 10.5 builder. http://codereview.appspot.com/5758044/diff/1/doc/install.html File doc/install.html (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/5758044/diff/1/doc/install.html#newcode122 doc/install.html:122: The installer should put the c:\Go\bin direcotry in your directory

PTAL http://codereview.appspot.com/5758044/diff/1/doc/install-source.html File doc/install-source.html (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/5758044/diff/1/doc/install-source.html#newcode263 doc/install-source.html:263: The release tag refers to the current stable release of Go 1. On 2012/03/06 02:34:05, bradfitz wrote: > s/ 1// ? > > Otherwise this statement won't be accurate for a bit. Done. http://codereview.appspot.com/5758044/diff/1/doc/install-source.html#newcode324 doc/install-source.html:324: darwin (Mac OS X 10.5 and above), freebsd, On 2012/03/06 02:34:05, bradfitz wrote: > oh, 10.5? I thought we'd slipped into 10.6+ at some point, but I can't remember > for sure. > > we certainly don't have a 10.5 builder. Not sure: http://code.google.com/p/go/issues/detail?id=3206 http://codereview.appspot.com/5758044/diff/1/doc/install.html File doc/install.html (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/5758044/diff/1/doc/install.html#newcode122 doc/install.html:122: The installer should put the c:\Go\bin direcotry in your On 2012/03/06 02:34:05, bradfitz wrote: > directory Done.

LGTM

http://codereview.appspot.com/5758044/diff/6/doc/install.html
File doc/install.html (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5758044/diff/6/doc/install.html#newcode124
doc/install.html:124: command prompts for the change to take effect.
is that the right phrase, open command prompts?

"Windows is shutting down. Please close all prompts."

Please remove the comment about fixing 107,
which will mark the bug closed.

Once we have confirmation that the binary distribution
works for people (on the per-system binary distribution
tracking bug that I don't believe exists yet), we can close
107.

subject: code review 5758044: doc: update install docs for Windows and Go 1, add gola...
